root: ^DAY ??? LOG - The light doesn't reach this far into the depths. Not even a single creature is visible to me as I gaze out. But I know that "its" out there. Its been watching me for so long now - and soon, it will do more than just watch.

^A wave of fear and helplessness has possessed my mind, althought I try so fervently to deny the horrible fate awaiting me. If I just repair the ship - I try to convince myself - if I can just do that, I'll be ok. I'll be ok right? Right!?
